File.AllUsersWebPart: <webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3"> <metaData> <type name="CAS.SmartFactory.Shepherd.Dashboards.LoadDescriptionWebPart.LoadDescriptionWebPart, $SharePoint.Project.AssemblyFullName$" /> <importErrorMessage>$Resources:core,ImportErrorMessage;</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="Title" type="string">Load Description</property> <property name="Description" type="string">My Visual WebPart</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>

<webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3" > <metaData> <type name="CAS.SmartFactory.Shepherd.Dashboards.TimeSlotWebPart.TimeSlotWebPart, $SharePoint.Project.AssemblyFullName$" /> <importErrorMessage>$Resources:core,ImportErrorMessage;</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="Title" type="string">Time Slots</property> <property name="Description" type="string">Allows to select Time Slot for planed shipping.</property> <property name="SimpleTimeSlotList" type="bool">true</property> <property name="Role" >Coordinator</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>

<webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3"> <metaData> <type name="CAS.SmartFactory.Shepherd.Dashboards.CarrierDashboard.CarrierDashboardWebPart.CarrierDashboardWebPart, $SharePoint.Project.AssemblyFullName$" /> <importErrorMessage>$Resources:core,ImportErrorMessage;</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="Title" type="string">Carrier Dashboard Manager</property> <property name="Description" type="string">This web part is a dedicated user interface for the user category Goods Handling.</property> <property name="ID" type="string">CarrierDashboardWebPart</property> <property name="Role" >Coordinator</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>

<webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3"> <metaData> <type name="CAS.SmartFactory.Shepherd.Dashboards.CarrierDashboard.TransportResources.TransportResources, $SharePoint.Project.AssemblyFullName$" /> <importErrorMessage>$Resources:core,ImportErrorMessage;</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="Title" type="string">Forwarder Resources Management</property> <property name="Provides functionality to manage divers crew and select transport equipment (truck/trailer combination)." type="string"></property> <property name="ID" type="string">WPTransportResources</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>
